products.title: Jacket
products.description: There's no need to seek shelter in Faherty’s Newport Jacket. Constructed in a compact woven twill, it’s the perfect jacket for navigating those in-between fall days.

products.title: Pants
products.description: CLASSIC WORKWEAR: Our most popular work pant, these wrinkle and stain resistant cotton/poly blend twill pants are built for hard wear & easy care.

products.title: Shirt
products.description: A wardrobe essential, this versatile mens shirt is designed to complement work trousers or jeans for a modern, simple and smart look.
